parameters: There's a man sleeping on the couch.
The man has a light dusting of cheese powder on his fingers and beard.
There might be something in his pockets, but you don't want to risk waking him up.
You are in a strange place. You don't know who to trust.
A bleeding corpse is on the couch.
You already took everything you may have needed.
Going through the corpse's pockets, you find an ID card reading "Master ID".
You've dirtied your hands for nothing.
The couch has a red stain on it.
It looks like someone tried to scrub out the stain before giving up.
They clearly didn't try the asprin or lemon juice method.
As impressive as it would be to take the couch, you can't.
Oh wait, did you want to check in the cushions or underneath it?
Well... There's an ID card here.
You've still dirtied your hands for nothing.
Looking at this couch makes you tremble for some reason.
